mapper.select: select a.bunyang_seq, a.ref_type, a.relation_type, a.user_id, a.user_name, a.birth_date, a.gender, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.post_number, a.address1, a.address2, a.is_church_person, a.couple_seq, a.church_officer, a.diocese from TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER a WHERE a.user_name = #{userName} AND REGEXP_REPLACE(a.birth_date, '[^0-9]+', '') = #{birthDate} AND cancel_seq is null AND NOT EXISTS(select 1 from TB_BUNYANG_INFO bi WHERE bi.bunyang_seq = a.bunyang_seq AND (bi.progress_status in('R','E') or bi.cancel_yn = 'Y')) ORDER BY case when ref_type = 'APPLY_USER' THEN 1 when ref_type = 'USE_USER' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END LIMIT 0, 1

select a.bunyang_seq, a.ref_type, a.relation_type, a.user_id, a.user_name, a.birth_date, a.gender, a.email, a.mobile, a.phone, a.post_number, a.address1, a.address2, a.is_church_person, a.couple_seq, a.church_officer, a.diocese from TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER a INNER JOIN TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER_LOGIN b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE b.session_id = #{sessionId} LIMIT 0, 1
select cast(CONNECT_COUPLE_TYPE_COUNT + CONNECT_SINGLE_TYPE_COUNT as int) as required_cnt from vw_bunyang_connect_info a where BUNYANG_SEQ = #{bunyangSeq}

select group_seq , bunyang_seq , couple_count + single_count as require_cnt from vw_bunyang_info where bunyang_seq = #{bunyangSeq} and progress_status != 'E'
union all
(select group_seq , bunyang_seq , couple_count + single_count as require_cnt from vw_bunyang_info where group_seq = (select group_seq from TB_BUNYANG_INFO where bunyang_seq = #{bunyangSeq}) and bunyang_seq != #{bunyangSeq} and progress_status != 'E' order by bunyang_seq )

select code_name as diocese_name, code_desc as minister_name, code_value1 as diocese, code_value as mobile, (select diocese from TB_BUNYANG_REF_USER ru WHERE ru.bunyang_seq = #{bunyangSeq} and ru.ref_type = 'APPLY_USER') user_diocese from TB_COM_CODE a WHERE a.parent_code_seq = 'CONTRACT_DIOCESE' and a.code_seq like 'MINISTER%' order by a.display_order
select code_value as mobile from TB_COM_CODE a WHERE a.parent_code_seq = 'CONTRACT' and a.code_seq = #{codeSeq}
select code_value as mobile from TB_COM_CODE a WHERE a.parent_code_seq = 'CONTRACT' and a.code_seq like concat(#{codeSeq},'%')
